Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vomiting \Vom"it*ing\, n. The spasmodic ejection of matter from the stomach through the mouth. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Vomit \Vom"it\, v. i. [imp. & p. p. {Vomited}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Vomiting}.] [Cf. L. vomere, vomitum, and v. freq. vomitare. See {Vomit}, n.] To eject the contents of the stomach by the mouth; to puke; to spew. [1913 Webster]
vomiting n : the reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth [syn: {vomit}, {emesis}, {regurgitation}, {disgorgement}, {puking}]
